data.title: Transformers Wiki
data.text:
Lance Henriksen (born May 5, 1940) is an American actor best known for his role as the android Bishop in the Alien film series and Bishop's human template in Alien vs. Predator. He also had notable roles in The Terminator, the TV series Millennium, a bazillion b-movies (including 3 out of 4 in the Pumpkinhead franchise) and has been in two movies with Khary Payton.

Henriksen has also dabbled in voice acting, most notably as Brainiac in Superman: Brainiac Attacks, Kerchak in Disney's Tarzan, the Grim Reaper in Avengers: Earth's Mightiest Heroes, Sergeant Zog in the 2012 Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles cartoon, General Tesler in TRON: Uprising, Andrei Rublev in IGPX, Admiral Steven Hackett in the Mass Effect series, General Shepherd in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2 and the Lieutenant in The Legend of Korra.

He is made entirely out of leather. Grade A Acting Leather.

Voice roles

Transformers Animated

Lockdown
